name: Colas Dark tv.nu
description:
Dark, clean and larger. For www.tv.nu
For the new tv.nu update Januari 2019
additional_info:
For the newest TV.NU update Januari 2019. Complete rewrite from scratch (again). Beta version, but unless I notice new flaws this is it.

Unfortunately their channel loading is still stupid. Not something I can fix. It wont load all channels unless you scroll down.

* Dark layout with some extra yellow.
* Cleaned: removed all crap. Ads might be gone, didn't test without adblocker. I use uBlock Origin (and also uMatrix).
* More columns! 6 over the entire screen instead of 4 tiny.


2019-01-22 Seems you can't press Esc to force load missing channels so expanded page length so you can scroll late night to load all channels. Fixing some colors on other pages, like movies etc. Fix login button to be usable/visible. Fix channels margins and look. 

2019-01-16 New rewrite for the new tv.nu.
